Let's start the project
item.description: Introduction I’ve got a domain for that project. Domain is ac.tivi.st. I think so good that is good name for a calendar/event application project. I’ll use AWS platform for cloud requirement. Besides, each service’s project structure will be clean architecture style. As the first step, I want to create a simple working version. I’ve bought domain (tivi.st) I’ve created an AWS account. I’ve created a terraform.io account for terraform state.
